text: @MSNBC @jheil What gives us more cases is labeling almost every death as covid-19. Covid-19 is no worse than the flu. This is the Deep State trying to take Trump out of office but it ain't going to work! #DonaldTrump WILL make liberals tears rain. #TrumpLandslideVictory2020
